verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: will] be breaking tradition in more than one way at the first state dinner with President Emmanuel Macron on Tuesday .
President Donald Trump will [V: be] breaking tradition in more than one way at the first state dinner with President Emmanuel Macron on Tuesday .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] be [V: breaking] [ARG1: tradition] [ARGM-MNR: in more than one way] [ARGM-LOC: at the first state dinner with President Emmanuel Macron] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] .
